title: The Carlyle Group - Wikipedia
snippet: The Carlyle Group Inc. is an American multinational company with operations in private equity, alternative asset management and financial services. As of 2023, the company had $426 billion of assets under management. Carlyle specializes in private equity, real assets, and private credit.

title: The Carlyle Group investment portfolio | PitchBook

title: The Carlyle Group | Institution Profile | Private Equity International
snippet: The Carlyle Group is a global private markets investment and asset management firm with operations across multiple asset classes. It focuses on private equity, global credit, real assets, and secondaries. Its private equity investments include buyouts, growth capital, and co-investments in companies across diverse sectors and geographies.

title: Carlyle - Baby Name, Origin, Meaning, And Popularity | Parenting Patch
snippet: The name Carlyle has its roots in the Old Norse and Old English languages. It is derived from the place name "Carlisle," which is believed to come from the Old Norse "karl," meaning "man," combined with the Old English "lēah," meaning "woodland" ...
